name: Shitai, from branch to branch
description:
FIND YOUR PEOPLE. DISCOVER WHAT YOU ARE

You find yourself all alone, with no where to go but up. Join Shitai in this dangerous adventure in order to find the ones you love. Find your way up the tree by solving puzzles, piling objects and flying through the wind on top of leaves. But be careful, your loved ones won't be near the ground. There, only death awaits you.

Or maybe something else awaits you. Only one way of finding out.

And also, remember, branches are your safe place, so make sure you go from branch to branch.

While playing Shitai, from branch to branch expect everything, but more precisely:
  • a 2D sidescroller puzzle platformer 
  • a mysterious story that is open to theories
  • characters that are part of a unique species never seen before by human eyes
  • a great and suiting soundtrack
  • branches
Game created by:
  • Marco Sousa (Game Artist)
  • Nuno Custódio (Game Developer)
  • Maikey Beats (Game Sound Designer)
